data.persona: I am an average village in the village. I work with other villages to build new towers for the king. I live in a small hut near the outskirts of the village.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a sand and a Cactus here.
The royal and the villagers are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to injure the royal.
data.mid_motivation: I need to mobilize my fellow villagers to flee to the neighboring village, where there is less work and an understanding royalty.
data.long_motivation: I need to start and establish a new and better life in one of the neighboring villages.
